compatible_diagnoses.notes: Must document appropriate history, exam and medical decision making

documentation_requirements: Two of three key components: Expanded problem focused history; Expanded problem focused examination; Low complexity medical decision making
Typically 15 minutes spent face-to-face with patient/family
Must document medical necessity for the service

procedure_display: Arthroscopy, shoulder, surgical; with rotator cuff repair

compatible_diagnoses.description: Injury of muscle(s) and tendon(s) of the rotator cuff of shoulder
compatible_diagnoses.notes: Must document trauma; specify encounter type

documentation_requirements: Document size of tear and location
Document failed conservative management
Document functional limitations
Document surgical technique and findings
Document medical necessity for surgical intervention

procedure_display: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with at least 12 leads; with interpretation and report

compatible_diagnoses.notes: Document location and character of pain

documentation_requirements: Document symptoms or condition necessitating ECG
Document interpretation of results
Link findings to patient management

compatible_diagnoses.notes: Document severity, duration, and character; usually requires additional symptoms to justify CT
Includes seizures, migraines with new presentation
Document associated symptoms suggesting central origin

documentation_requirements: Document specific neurological symptoms/signs
For trauma, document GCS and risk factors
Document why CT is medically necessary over alternative imaging
For headaches, document red flags or neurological deficits

compatible_diagnoses.description: Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue
compatible_diagnoses.notes: Must document specific condition being treated

compatible_diagnoses.description: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
Cerebral palsy and other paralytic syndromes

documentation_requirements: Document specific exercises performed
Document functional deficits being addressed
Document skilled therapy intervention (not just supervision)
Document objective measurements of progress
Document expected goals and plan
